Name: Alchemy
Description: Your effectiveness at utilizing potions.

Name: Diplomacy
Description: Your ability to persuade other people.

Name: Discipline
Description: Your effectiveness at teaching yourself and how quickly you gain experience.

Name: Concealment
Description: How well you can hide from enemies.

Name: Foraging
Description: Your ability to find items while exploring.

Name: Might
Description: Your ability to swing heavy objects and deal melee damage.

Name: Apprentice
Description: Study of the arcane arts allows you to become capable of learning spells.

Name: Arcanum
Description: Through your studies you become capable of raising your maximum sanctity. Master this ability to unlock the Philosopher calling

Name: Backstab
Description: You are more likely to attack first in combat.

Name: Bash
Description: Your proficiency with blunt weapons is increased.

Name: Blackhearted
Description: Your sinister nature is more apparent. Actions affect your virtue more quickly. Master this ability to unlock the Assassin calling

Name: Charmer
Description: Your relation with other people raises much more quickly.

Name: Haggler
Description: You can get a better price at stores through negoations.

Name: Martial Arts
Description: You deal more damage in combat when fighting with no weapon.

Name: Meditation
Description: Regenerate sanctity per day.

Name: Poet
Description: Gain renown faster. Master this ability to unlock the Opportunist archetype.

Name: Relentless
Description: Gain maximum health. Master this ability to unlock the Brute archetype.

Name: Scholar
Description: Gain experience faster.

Name: Skinner
Description: (BROKEN)You have a chance of obtaining a usable fur after kiling a beast.

Name: Strider
Description: (BROKEN)Traveling on the map requires less endurance.

Name: Student
Description: (BROKEN)You are capable of learning additional spells.

Name: Traveler
Description: Reveal more of the map when exploring new places. Master this ability to unlock the Survivalist archetype.

Name: Trickster
Description: Become harder to detect when performing stealthy activities. Master this ability to unlock the Scoundrel archetype.

Name: Vigilance
Description: (BROKEN)You are less likely to be ambushed.

Name: Poisoned Blades
Description: Successful attacks apply a poison to the enemy

Name: Poison Mastery
Description: Your poisons last an additional round

Name: Vampiric Aura
Description: You steal life per hit

Name: Lifeleech
Description: You steal life based on how much damage you deal in combat

Name: Frozen Blades
Description: Gives your weapon a chance of freezing enemies attacked

Name: Frozen Heart
Description: Makes you immediately thaw out if frozen in combat

Name: Immunity
Description: Your poison resistance is increased

Name: FireBlades
Description: Gives your weapon flaming damage
